updates.details: Firewall upgrade as part of transition to STFC Cloud. Anticpate 30 minutes of downtime between 08:00-10:00 + 90 mins contingency.

affectedServices: /gws/nopw/*, CEDA Archive and some other services

updates.details: Issue identified, system team investigating with storage vendor. May cause widespread disruption as this storage is used in many services.
